metadata.title: CVE-2020-12769 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.4.17.drivers/spi/spi-dw.c allows attackers to cause a panic via concurrent callsto dw_spi_irq and dw_spi_transfer_one, aka CID-19b61392c5a8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12769` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-184-generic - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-4.4.0-184-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-4.4.0-184-lowlatency - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-184-generic - 4.4.0-184.214
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-184-lowlatency - 4.4.0-184.214
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-96-generic - 4.15.0-96.97~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-96-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-96.97~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-96-lowlatency - 4.15.0-96.97~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-96-generic - 4.15.0-96.97~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-96-lowlatency - 4.15.0-96.97~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1075-kvm - 4.4.0-1075.82
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1109-aws - 4.4.0-1109.120
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1065-aws - 4.15.0-1065.69~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1077-azure - 4.15.0-1077.82
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1060-gcp - 4.15.0-1060.64
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1037-oracle - 4.15.0-1037.41~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1135-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1135.144
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1139-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1139.147
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1041-fips - 4.4.0-1041.46
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1041-fips - 4.4.0-1041.46
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-1041-fips - 4.4.0-1041.46
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.4.0-1041-fips - 4.4.0-1041.46
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-184.214').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-96.97~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1075.82').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1109.120').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1065.69~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1077.82').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1060.64').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1037.41~16.04.1').
linux-raspi2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1135.144').
linux-snapdragon package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1139.147').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1041.46').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
